com.googlecode.gmail4j.auth
Class GmailHttpAuthenticator

java.lang.Object
  java.net.Authenticator
      com.googlecode.gmail4j.auth.GmailHttpAuthenticator

public class GmailHttpAuthenticator
extends java.net.Authenticator

Http Authenticator for GmailClient implementations that require HTTP access to Gmail service.

Activate it with Authenticator.setDefault(Authenticator): 

     Credentials login = new Credentials(username, password);
     Authenticator.setDefault(new GmailHttpAuthenticator(login));

RssGmailClient automatically activates this on RssGmailClient.init().

Since:
0.1
Version:
